MemeDef.label: Snaff Cult of Personality
MemeDef.description:
This Faction observes the ancient religion of the High Jeubs originate from the planet of Rata Jeub. Originally called Rata Skelk, Jeubs were eusocial, non-sapient livestock and domesticated pets owned and exploited by a race of sapient beings called Skelks. At some point, over the tens of thousans of years of Skelken domestication of the Jeubs, a mutation occured that granted a Jeub true consciousness and human-level intelligence. This was the first High Jeub. This Jeub, who named himself Snaff, after the Skelks' god of death and sacrifice, exploited the bee-like, eusocial structure of his kind to rally the non-sapient Jeubs into his service. 
 
 Starting by rallying the Jeubcallers, a caste of Jeub that Skelks used to direct Jeubs, he used them to eventually ammass the billions of Jeubs from farms, residences, and processing centers all across the planet. The battle was short, as Skelks were so reliant on Jeubs as mounts, livestock, and food that the sudden elimination of the species from their domestication led to famines, frozen infrastructure, and collapse in their medieval societies. 
 
 Snaff would then find another mutated Jeub, Zroxxa, and the pair created every High Jeub after them. Today, High Jeubs and their non-sapient servants exist all across the galaxy, and their religion has also picked up sporadic followers outside of their species. Contact with human society has influenced their reverence by adding "Jeb!", an unremarkable Old Earth politician known primarily for being a pushover, as a prophet whose weakness represented the slavery of Jeubs under the Skelks.
